mapper.insert: insert into CtrlOrder (Time, UserID, StationID, State, DeviceID, CtrlRecordID) values (#{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{userID,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{stationID,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{deviceID,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{ctrlRecordID,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update CtrlOrder set Time = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UserID = #{userID,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, StationID = #{stationID,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, State = #{state,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, DeviceID = #{deviceID,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, CtrlRecordID = #{ctrlRecordID,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ID = #{ID,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select ID, Time, UserID, StationID, State, DeviceID, CtrlRecordID from CtrlOrder
